description:
A heavy-duty workhorse to help you get up that big wall. A reinforced clip-in point and added stability on the steps make for a long-time climbing buddy.

  • Durable nylon materials to keep it in your roster for longer
  • An aluminum spreader bar and stiffened steps keep its shape for ease of use
  • Elasticated foot keepers on the bottom 3 rungs keep your foot in place for those sticky moments
name: Black Diamond Stepup 6 Ladder
